title: Tel Me Terumi Tell Me: Jagged Fuzzed D.N.A.
original_name: テルミ × テルミ × テルミ ~Jagged Fuzzed D.N.A.~
sinopse: "Time is complete". When the star of misfortune falls, a door to a new world will begin to open. Rumors of man-eating goats...continuous murder crimes, one after the other more and more cases appear. Soon Terumi, a high school student who has lived his life in relative peace, will soon start on his road to his destiny.
